name: Point-Blank Shot
text: You are especially accurate when making ranged attacks against close targets.
benefit: You get a +1 bonus on attack and damage rolls with ranged weapons at ranges of up to 30 feet.
staminaText: You can spend up to 6 stamina points to increase this feat’s range by 5 feet for each stamina point you spent.
mythicText: Your accuracy with ranged attacks is unmatched at pointblank range.
mythicBenefit: The bonus on attack and damage rolls granted by Point-Blank Shot increases to +2. As a swift action, you can expend one use of mythic power to gain an additional bonus on these rolls equal to half your tier.
text_zh: 你对远程攻击近程目标颇有心得。
benefit_zh: 你使用远程武器攻击30尺内的目标时在攻击和伤害检定上获得+1加值。
mythicText_zh: 只要距离够近，你的远程攻击就会无比精确。
mythicBenefit_zh: 近距射击专长对攻击与伤害检定的加值提升至2点。以迅捷动作，你能够花费1次神话之力，使这些检定获得等同于你的阶层的一半的额外加值。
staminaText_zh: 你可以消耗至多6点耐力来提升这个专长的范围，每消耗1点提升5尺。
